abstract: Obama administration stiffs Fox News and jumps in governor’s race. Meet the new boss.
snippet: Obama administration stiffs Fox News and jumps in governor’s race. Meet the new boss.
lead_paragraph: As Alessandra Stanley wrote in Monday’s Times, the Obama administration made a point not to include Fox News in its diaspora of Sunday morning talk shows. Although he hit many other letters in the broadcast alphabet — CNN, NBC, ABC, CBS and Univision — F, O, and X were ignored. As Ms. Stanley wrote:

headline.main: Middle Way Meets Fork in the Road?
